subject: Re: Order #SSN4761, how did it go?
description_text:
Hello,
 My order (CE326636795DE) has not arrived yet. Tomorrow will be a month since the order. And the shipping status from DHL is unchanged from before Christmas. Please choose another courier who can send me the product faster. I have been waiting for the package for a month. My son keeps asking me about the Christmas gift. Please help me with the delivery of the package. 
    On Monday, 12 January 2026 at 16:08:36 EET, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

conversations.body_text: Hi Essenkahn KM,  Our German warehouse has informed us that DHL is still investigating the matter, and a shipment destined for Romania has been held up. We will urge them to provide updates promptly or arrange for a replacement shipment.
